Add vertical lines

Source: R/PLOT.locus.R
PLOT.add_multitrack_lines.Rd

Adds vertical lines indicates key SNPs

PLOT.add_multitrack_lines(
  TRKS,
  finemap_dat,
  snp_groups = c("Lead", "UCS", "Consensus"),
  line_alpha = 1,
  line_size = 0.3,
  remove_duplicated_UCS_Consensus = T,
  verbose = F
)

See also

Other plot: PLOT.dot_summary(), PLOT.get_window_limits(), PLOT.get_window_suffix()
